data.name: AppointmentImagesDayClock
data.value: Provides access to settings of an image, representing the day clock.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerSubject
data.value: Gets the subject of the appointment.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerStatusDataSource
data.value: Gets the data source used to provide a list of appointment statuses

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerStart
data.value: Gets the start date and time of the appointment.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerShouldShowRecurrence
data.value: Indicates whether the form should display a button, which reveals a section dedicated to the recurrence behavior.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerSaveScript
data.value: Gets the body of the save function.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerSaveHandler
data.value: Gets the function handler for the save function.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerResourceDataSource
data.value: Gets the data source used to provide a list of resources for appointments.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerReminderDataSource
data.value: Gets the data source used to provide a list of alert times for reminders.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerRecurrenceWeekOfMonth
data.value: Gets the occurrence number of the week in a month for the recurrence pattern.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerRecurrenceWeekDays
data.value: Gets the day/days in a week that the corresponding appointment re-occurs on.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerRecurrenceType
data.value: Gets or sets the time base for the frequency of the appointment's recurrences.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerRecurrenceStart
data.value: Gets the recurrence start date.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerRecurrenceRange
data.value: Sets the time boundaries/limits of the recurrence.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerRecurrencePeriodicity
data.value: Gets the frequency with which the corresponding appointment re-occurs.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerRecurrenceOccurrenceCount
data.value: Gets a value specifying how many times the appointment occurs.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerRecurrenceMonth
data.value: Gets the month (as a number) on which the appointment re-occurs.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerRecurrenceEnd
data.value: Gets the recurrence's end date.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerRecurrenceDayNumber
data.value: Gets the ordinal number of a day within a defined month.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerLabelDataSource
data.value: Gets the data source used to provide a list of appointment labels.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerIsRecurring
data.value: Gets a value indicating if the appointment is recurring.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerEnd
data.value: Gets the end date and time of the appointment.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerDeleteScript
data.value: Gets the body of the delete function.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerDeleteHandler
data.value: Gets the function handler for the delete function.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerCanEditResource
data.value: Gets a value that indicates whether a resource can be changed for the appointment which is currently being edited in the form.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerCanDeleteAppointment
data.value: Gets a value that indicates if the appointment currently being edited in the form can be deleted.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerBaseSaveScript
data.value: Override this property in derived classes to get the save function body.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerBaseSaveHandler
data.value: Override this property in derived classes to get the save function handler.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerBaseIsNewAppointment
data.value: Indicates whether the currently edited appointment is a new object and not a pattern recurrence.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerBaseCustomFields
data.value: Gets the collection of custom fields bound to the appointment.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerBaseCancelScript
data.value: Gets the body of the cancel function.

data.name: AppointmentFormTemplateContainerBaseCancelHandler
data.value: Gets the handler of the cancel function.

data.name: AppointmentImagesStartArrow
data.value: Provides access to settings of an image, representing the start arrow.

data.name: AppointmentImagesReminder
data.value: Provides access to settings of an image, representing the reminder.

data.name: AppointmentImagesRecurrence
data.value: Provides access to settings of an image, representing the \"Recurrence\" symbol.

data.name: AppointmentImagesNoRecurrence
data.value: Provides access to settings of an image, representing the \"No Recurrence\" symbol.

data.name: AppointmentImagesNightClock
data.value: Provides access to settings of an image, representing the night clock.

data.name: AppointmentImagesEndArrow
data.value: Provides access to settings of an image, representing the end arrow.

data.name: AppointmentInplaceEditorTemplateContainerEditFormHandler
data.value: Gets the function handler for the edit function.

data.name: AppointmentInplaceEditorTemplateContainerEditFormScript
data.value: Gets the body of the edit function.

data.name: AppointmentInplaceEditorTemplateContainerSaveHandler
data.value: Gets the function handler for the save function.

data.name: AppointmentInplaceEditorTemplateContainerSaveScript
data.value: Gets the body of the save function.

data.name: AppointmentTemplateContainerAppointmentViewInfo
data.value: Provides access to the view information for the selected appoinment.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentCustomFieldMappingMember
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the member in a datasource which should be mapped to a specific property.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoAllDay
data.value: Gets or sets the data field which an appointment's Appointment.AllDay property is bound to.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoAppointmentId
data.value: Gets or sets the data field, to which an appointment's unique identifier is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoDescription
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.Description property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoEnd
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.End property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoLabel
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.LabelId property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoLocation
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.Location property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoRecurrenceInfo
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.RecurrenceInfo property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoReminderInfo
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.Reminder property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoResourceId
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.ResourceId property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoStart
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.Start property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoStatus
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.StatusId property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoSubject
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.Subject property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentMappingInfoType
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.Type property is bound.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentStorageAutoRetrieveId
data.value: Gets or sets whether the ID of a new appointment is retrieved from the data source.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentStorageCommitIdToDataSource
data.value: Gets or sets whether the IPersistentObject.Id property value is committed to the underlying datasource.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentStorageCustomFieldMappings
data.value: Provides access to the collection of mappings of the appointment's custom properties.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentStorageLabels
data.value: Gets the collection of appointment labels.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentStorageMappings
data.value: Provides access to the object containing a set of appointment's properties mappings.

data.name: ASPxAppointmentStorageStatuses
data.value: Gets the collection of appointment statuses.

data.name: ASPxDateNavigatorImageFolder
data.value: Gets or sets the path to the folder that contains images used by the control.

data.name: ASPxDateNavigatorProperties
data.value: Provides access to an object, representing the properties specific to the ASPxCalendar base class.

data.name: ASPxDateNavigatorSpriteCssFilePath
data.value: Gets or sets the path to a CSS file that defines the control's sprite image settings.

data.name: ASPxDateNavigatorSpriteImageUrl
data.value: Gets or sets the path to a sprite image.

data.name: ASPxResourceCustomFieldMappingMember
data.value: Gets or sets the name of the member in a datasource which should be mapped to a specific property.

data.name: ASPxResourceMappingInfoCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the data field which a resource's Resource.Caption property is bound to.

data.name: ASPxResourceMappingInfoColor
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which a resource's color property is bound.

data.name: ASPxResourceMappingInfoImage
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which a resource's Resource.ImageBytes property is bound.

data.name: ASPxResourceMappingInfoResourceId
data.value: Gets or sets the data field to which an appointment's Appointment.ResourceId property is bound.

data.name: ASPxResourceNavigatorImages
data.value: Provides access to the settings that define images displayed within the Resource Navigator.

data.name: ASPxResourceNavigatorProperties
data.value: Provides access to an object, representing the properties specific to the Resource Navigator control.

data.name: ASPxResourceNavigatorStyles
data.value: Provides access to style settings that control the appearance of the Resource Navigator.

data.name: ASPxResourceStorageCustomFieldMappings
data.value: Provides access to the collection of mappings of the resource's custom properties.

data.name: ASPxResourceStorageMappings
data.value: Provides access to the object containing a set of resource's properties mappings.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerActiveViewChanged
data.value: Occurs after the active view of the Scheduler has been changed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerActiveViewChanging
data.value: Occurs when the Scheduler control is about to change its active View.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerActiveViewType
data.value: Gets or sets the type of the View which is currently used by the Scheduler to show its data.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAfterExecuteCallbackCommand
data.value: Occurs after a callback command is executed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAllowAppointmentConflicts
data.value: Occurs when the scheduler finds appointments that are in conflict, and the SchedulerOptionsCustomization.AllowAppointmentConflicts property is set to AppointmentConflictsMode.Custom.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAllowAppointmentCopy
data.value: Occurs when an end-user attempts to copy an appointment and the SchedulerOptionsCustomization.AllowAppointmentCopy property is set to Custom.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAllowAppointmentCreate
data.value: Occurs when an end-user attempts to create a new appointment and the SchedulerOptionsCustomization.AllowAppointmentCreate property is set to Custom.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAllowAppointmentDelete
data.value: Occurs when an end-user attempts to delete an appointment and the SchedulerOptionsCustomization.AllowAppointmentDelete property is set to Custom.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAllowAppointmentDrag
data.value: Occurs when an end-user attempts to drag an appointment and the SchedulerOptionsCustomization.AllowAppointmentDrag property is set to Custom.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAllowAppointmentDragBetweenResources
data.value: Occurs when an end-user attempts to drag an drop an appointment between resources and the SchedulerControl.AllowAppointmentDragBetweenResources property is set to Custom.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAllowAppointmentEdit
data.value: Occurs when an end-user attempts to edit an appointment and the SchedulerOptionsCustomization.AllowAppointmentEdit property is set to Custom.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAllowAppointmentResize
data.value: Occurs when an end-user attempts to resize an appointment and the SchedulerOptionsCustomization.AllowAppointmentResize property is set to Custom.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAllowInplaceEditor
data.value: Occurs when an end-user attempts to invoke an appointment's in-place editor and the SchedulerOptionsCustomization.AllowInplaceEditor property is set to Custom.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentChanging
data.value: Fires when an appointment's property is about to be changed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentCollectionAutoReloading
data.value: Occurs when the data source which contains appointment records is modified and appointments are set to be automatically reloaded.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentCollectionCleared
data.value: Fires after the appointment collection has been cleared.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentCollectionLoaded
data.value: Fires after appointments have been loaded into the AppointmentBaseCollection collection.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentDataSourceID
data.value: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the ASPxScheduler retrieves the appointments.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentDeleting
data.value: Occurs before an appointment is deleted and allows you to cancel the action.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentFormShowing
data.value: Occurs before the appointment editing window is created.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentInplaceEditorShowing
data.value: Occurs before an inplace appointment editor is invoked.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentInserting
data.value: Occurs before an appointment is added to the AppointmentBaseCollection collection and allows you to cancel the operation.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentRowDeleted
data.value: Fires after an appointment's data row is deleted from the data source.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentRowDeleting
data.value: Fires before an appointment data row is deleted from the data source.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentRowInserted
data.value: Fires after a new record containing appointment information is inserted into the data source.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentRowInserting
data.value: Fires before appointment data is posted to the data source for insertion.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentRowUpdated
data.value: Fires after an appointment's data record is updated.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentRowUpdating
data.value: Fires before the appointment data is posted to the data source to update the record.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentsChanged
data.value: Occurs after the appointment properties are changed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentsDeleted
data.value: Occurs after the appointment's deletion.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentsInserted
data.value: Occurs after appointments are added to the collection.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerAppointmentViewInfoCustomizing
data.value: Occurs every time an appointment is rendered, so its AppointmentViewInfoCustomizingEventArgs.ViewInfo is changed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerBeforeExecuteCallbackCommand
data.value: Fires before a callback command is executed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerBeforeGetCallbackResult
data.value: Occurs after a callback sent by the current control has been processed on the server, but prior to the time the respective callback result render is formed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerClientInstanceName
data.value: Gets or sets the ASPxScheduler's client programmatic identifier.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerClientLayout
data.value: Enables you to save and restore the previously saved layout of the scheduler.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerClientSideEvents
data.value: Gets an object that lists the client-side events specific to the ASPxScheduler.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerClientVisible
data.value: Gets or sets whether the ASPxScheduler client control is displayed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerCustomCallback
data.value: Fires when a round trip to the server has been initiated by a call to the client PerformCallback method.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerCustomErrorText
data.value: Enables you to provide custom error descriptions.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerCustomizeElementStyle
data.value: Fires before a scheduler's visual element is rendered.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerCustomJSProperties
data.value: Enables you to supply any server data that can then be parsed on the client.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerDateNavigatorQueryActiveViewType
data.value: Enables you to specify a view type to which the Scheduler switches after the end-user changes selected dates in the DateNavigator control.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerEnableCallbackAnimation
data.value: Gets or sets whether animation effects are applied to scheduler content when it is updated using a callback.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerEnableCallbackCompression
data.value: Gets or sets whether the callback result data compression is enabled.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerEnableCallBacks
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the callback or postback technology is used to manage round trips to the server.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerEnableChangeVisibleIntervalCallbackAnimation
data.value: Gets or sets whether animation effects are applied to scheduler content when the visible interval is changed and the scheduler is updated using a callback.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerEnableChangeVisibleIntervalGestures
data.value: Gets or sets a value specifying whether an end-user can change the visible interval with a swipe gesture.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerFetchAppointments
data.value: Occurs before the ASPxScheduler starts retrieving the appointments for the specified time interval.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerFilterAppointment
data.value: Enables specific appointments to be hidden in the ASPxScheduler control.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerFilterResource
data.value: Enables specific resources to be hidden in the Scheduler control.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerGotoDateFormShowing
data.value: Occurs before the Go To Date dialog window is invoked.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerGroupType
data.value: Gets or sets a value that specifies the type of grouping for the appointments of the ASPxScheduler control.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerHtmlTimeCellPrepared
data.value: Occurs when the HTML code representing the time cell is prepared for display.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerImages
data.value: Provides access to the settings that define images displayed within the ASPxScheduler's visual elements .

data.name: ASPxSchedulerInitAppointmentDisplayText
data.value: Enables custom text and a description to be displayed within appointments.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerInitAppointmentImages
data.value: Enables custom images to be displayed within appointments.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerInitClientAppointment
data.value: This event fires for each visible appointment before it is sent to the client for display and enables you to specify client appointment properties.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerInitNewAppointment
data.value: Occurs before a new appointment is created in the scheduler.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerJSProperties
data.value: Gets a collection of temporary client properties and its values.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerLimitInterval
data.value: Gets or sets the time interval available for end-users.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerMoreButtonClicked
data.value: Server-side event. Occurs when the user clicks one of the More Buttons.ASPxScheduler.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsBehavior
data.value: Provides access to options which regulate the general appearance and behavior of the scheduler and its satellite controls.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsBehaviorShowDetailedErrorInfo
data.value: Specifies whether detailed error information is displayed on the form when an error occurs.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsBehaviorShowViewNavigator
data.value: Determines whether the View Navigator control is displayed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsBehaviorShowViewNavigatorGotoDateButton
data.value: Gets or sets whether the 'Go to Date' button of the ASPxViewNavigator is shown.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsBehaviorShowViewSelector
data.value: Determines whether the View Selector is displayed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsBehaviorShowViewVisibleInterval
data.value: Determines whether the View Visible Interval control is displayed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCellAutoHeightMaxHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the maximum height of time cells when using the LimitHeight mode.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCellAutoHeightMinHeight
data.value: Gets or sets the minimum height of time cells when using the LimitHeight mode.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCellAutoHeightMode
data.value: Specifies a mode for automatic calculation of cell height.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookies
data.value: Provides access to an object used to maintain view state information.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookiesCookiesID
data.value: Gets or sets the cookie's name (identifier).

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookiesEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether cookies are enabled.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookiesStoreActiveViewType
data.value: Gets or sets whether the information about the current active view type should be saved in a cookie.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookiesStoreDayViewTimeScale
data.value: Gets or sets whether the value of the current DayView.TimeScale property should be saved in a cookie.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookiesStoreGroupType
data.value: Gets or sets whether the value of the current ASPxScheduler.GroupType property should be saved in a cookie.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookiesStoreStart
data.value: Gets or sets whether the value of the current ASPxScheduler.Start property should be saved in a cookie.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookiesStoreTimelineScalesInfo
data.value: Gets or sets whether the information about enabled and visible scales in the Timeline View should be saved in a cookie.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookiesStoreTimeZoneId
data.value: Gets or sets whether the information about the current SchedulerOptionsBehaviorBase.ClientTimeZoneId should be saved in a cookie.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookiesStoreWorkWeekViewTimeScale
data.value: Gets or sets whether the information about the DayView.TimeScale property of the Work-Week View should be saved in a cookie.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCookiesVersion
data.value: Gets or sets the version information saved in a cookie.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsCustomization
data.value: Provides access to the options that regulate the functionality available to end-users.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsForms
data.value: Provides access to the options used to customize the forms shown to end-users.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsFormsAppointmentFormTemplateUrl
data.value: Gets or sets a template location for the appointment's editing form.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsFormsAppointmentFormVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets the option that specifies how an appointment form has to be shown.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsFormsAppointmentInplaceEditorFormTemplateUrl
data.value: Gets or sets a template location for the form containing the in-place editor.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsFormsGotoDateFormTemplateUrl
data.value: Gets or sets a template location for the form used to navigate to a particular date.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsFormsGotoDateFormVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets an option that specifies how the date navigation form is shown.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsFormsRecurrentAppointmentDeleteFormTemplateUrl
data.value: Gets or sets a template location for the form used to prompt the user for the deletion of the recurrent appointment.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsFormsRecurrentAppointmentDeleteFormVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets the option that specifies how a form has to be shown.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsFormsRecurrentAppointmentEditFormTemplateUrl
data.value: Gets or sets a template location for the form used to prompt the user for editing of the recurrent appointment.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsFormsRecurrentAppointmentEditFormVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets the option that specifies how a form has to be shown.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsFormsRemindersFormTemplateUrl
data.value: Gets or sets a template location for the form used to edit an alert associated with the current appointment.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsLoadingPanel
data.value: Provides access to the settings for the informational panel, which is displayed when the control is loading.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsLoadingPanelText
data.value: Gets or sets the text displayed in the Loading Panel.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsMenu
data.value: Provides access to menu options.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsMenuEnableMenuScrolling
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether submenu scrolling is enabled in the menu.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsToolTips
data.value: Provides access to options which specify tooltip appearance and visibility.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsToolTipsAppointmentDragToolTipCornerType
data.value: Gets or sets the shape of the corners for the tooltip that appears when an appointment is dragged.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsToolTipsAppointmentDragToolTipUrl
data.value: Gets or sets the location of the custom tooltip form shown when an appointment is dragged.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsToolTipsAppointmentToolTipCornerType
data.value: Gets or sets the shape of the corners for the appointment tooltip.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsToolTipsAppointmentToolTipUrl
data.value: Gets or sets the location of the custom tooltip form shown when the mouse hovers over an appointment.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsToolTipsSelectionToolTipCornerType
data.value: Gets or sets the shape of the corners for the time cell selection tooltip.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsToolTipsSelectionToolTipUrl
data.value: Gets or sets the location of the custom tooltip form shown when the mouse cursor is positioned above selected time cells.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsToolTipsShowAppointmentDragToolTip
data.value: Gets or sets whether a tooltip is shown when an appointment is dragged.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsToolTipsShowAppointmentToolTip
data.value: Gets or sets whether a tooltip is shown for an appointment.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsToolTipsShowSelectionToolTip
data.value: true if a tooltip is shown for a selected area in the scheduler; otherwise, false.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerOptionsView
data.value: Provides access to the Scheduler's view options.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPopupMenuBeginGroup
data.value: Gets or sets whether the menu item appears at the beginning of a group of items on the menu.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPopupMenuCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the text string used as a menu item caption.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPopupMenuEnableViewState
data.value: This property is not in use.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPopupMenuItemsCount
data.value: Gets the number of menu items in a current menu.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPopupMenuShowing
data.value: Occurs before a popup menu is created and allows menu customization.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrepareAppointmentFormPopupContainer
data.value: Occurs when the pop-up container for the Appointment Form is prepared for display.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrepareAppointmentInplaceEditorPopupContainer
data.value: Occurs when the pop-up container for the In-place Editor is prepared for display.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrepareGotoDateFormPopupContainer
data.value: Occurs when the pop-up container for the Go to Date Form is prepared for display.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrepareRecurrenceAppointmentDeleteFormPopupContainer
data.value: Occurs when the pop-up container for the Delete Recurrence Form is prepared for display.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrepareRecurrenceAppointmentEditFormPopupContainer
data.value: Occurs when the pop-up container for the Edit Recurrence Form is prepared for display.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrepareRemindersFormPopupContainer
data.value: Occurs when the pop-up container for the Reminders Form is prepared for display.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseClientTimeZoneId
data.value: Gets or sets the client time zone of the Scheduler that is used in the scheduler report.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseEnableSmartSync
data.value: Gets or sets whether different controls in a report should synchronize their data iterations (the SmartSync Printing feature).

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseFirstDayOfWeek
data.value: Gets or sets the day that starts the scheduler week.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseSchedulerControlID
data.value: Gets or sets the ID of the ASPxScheduler control on a page.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseSmartSyncOptions
data.value: Provides access to options specific to the SmartSync Printing feature.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseTimeInterval
data.value: Gets or sets the time interval used by the print adapter to create a report.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseValidateAppointments
data.value: Occurs when appointments are retrieved to create a report document.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseValidateResources
data.value: Occurs when resources are obtained for use in the report.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseValidateTimeIntervals
data.value: Occurs when the print adapter retrieves information on the time intervals required for creating a report.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseValidateWorkTime
data.value: Occurs when the print adapter retrieves the work time value for use in the report.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerPrintAdapterBaseWorkTime
data.value: Gets or sets the work time interval for a day.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerQueryWorkTime
data.value: Occurs when the scheduler's view calculates the work time interval for the specific resource.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerRecurrentAppointmentDeleteFormShowing
data.value: Occurs before the Confirm Delete dialog window is invoked.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerRecurrentAppointmentEditFormShowing
data.value: Occurs before the Open Recurring Item dialog window is invoked.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerRelatedControlBaseMasterControl
data.value: Provides access to the host control for satellite controls of the ASPxScheduler Suite.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerRelatedControlBaseMasterControlID
data.value: Get or sets the ID of the master control for the scheduler satellite controls.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerReminderAlert
data.value: Occurs when a reminder is triggered.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerRemindersFormDefaultAction
data.value: Occurs when an end-user doesn't click the Dismiss or Snooze button on the Reminders Form, but simply closes it. The SchedulerOptionsBehaviorBase.RemindersFormDefaultAction property should be set to RemindersFormDefaultAction.Custom.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerRemindersFormShowing
data.value: Occurs before the Reminders form is displayed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourceChanging
data.value: Fires when a resource's property is about to be changed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourceCollectionAutoReloading
data.value: Occurs when the data source which contains resources is modified, and the automatic reloading of resources is enabled.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourceCollectionCleared
data.value: Fires after the resources collection has been cleared.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourceCollectionLoaded
data.value: Fires after resources have been loaded into the ResourceBaseCollection collection.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourceDataSourceID
data.value: Gets or sets the ID of the control from which the ASPxScheduler retrieves the resources.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourceDeleting
data.value: Allows the deletion of a resource to be cancelled.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourceInserting
data.value: Allows you to cancel the addition of a resource.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourceNavigator
data.value: Gets the Resource Navigator control used to navigate through resources by end-users.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourcesChanged
data.value: Fires when the resources' properties are changed.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourcesDeleted
data.value: Occurs when a scheduler's resource is deleted from the collection.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerResourcesInserted
data.value: Occurs when new resources are inserted into the ResourceBaseCollection collection.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerStart
data.value: Gets or sets the start date of the scheduler.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerStorage
data.value: Provides access to the storage object of the ASPxScheduler control.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerStorageAppointments
data.value: Gets a storage object that contains appointment related information.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerStorageResources
data.value: Gets the object which manages resources for appointments.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerStyles
data.value: Provides access to style settings that control the appearance of the ASPxScheduler elements.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerUnhandledException
data.value: Enables you to catch an unhandled exception in ASPxScheduler which occurs during a callback and stop its propagation beyond the control.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerViews
data.value: Contains the settings of the Views that are used to represent information within the ASPxScheduler control.

data.name: ASPxSchedulerVisibleIntervalChanged
data.value: Fires when the time interval represented by the control's scheduling area has been changed.

data.name: ASPxViewNavigatorCalendarPopupDiv
data.value: Provides access to a container for the popup calendar.

data.name: ASPxViewNavigatorGotoDateButtonItem
data.value: Provides access to an object responsible for creating the 'Go to Date' button

data.name: ASPxViewNavigatorGotoDateCalendar
data.value: Provides access to a calendar control that is used to select a date.

data.name: ASPxViewNavigatorImages
data.value: Provides access to the settings that define images displayed within the ASPxViewNavigator's View Navigator.

data.name: ASPxViewNavigatorStyles
data.value: Provides access to style settings that control the appearance of the View Navigator.

data.name: ASPxViewSelectorButtonsRepeatDirection
data.value: Gets or sets the orientation of buttons on a ViewSelector control.

data.name: ASPxViewSelectorStyles
data.value: Provides access to style settings that control the appearance of the View Selector.

data.name: DailyRecurrenceControlPeriodicity
data.value: Gets or sets the number of days between appointment occurrences.

data.name: DailyRecurrenceControlWeekDays
data.value: Gets or sets the days of the week for appointment scheduling.

data.name: DateNavigatorPropertiesBoldAppointmentDates
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating if the dates which contain appointments should be shown in a bold style.

data.name: DayViewAppointmentDisplayOptions
data.value: Provides access to the Day View appointments display options.

data.name: DayViewDayCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of days that are simultaneously displayed within the Day View.

data.name: DayViewShowAllAppointmentsAtTimeCells
data.value: Gets or sets whether the AllDay appointments are displayed in time cells instead of the All-Day Area.

data.name: DayViewShowAllDayArea
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies if the All-Day Area is shown when a Scheduler shows its data in the Day View.

data.name: DayViewShowDayHeaders
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies if Day Headers are shown when a scheduler shows its data in the Day View or the Work-Week View views.

data.name: DayViewShowMoreButtonsOnEachColumn
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to show the \"more\" buttons on each column or only on the Time Ruler in the Day View.

data.name: DayViewShowWorkTimeOnly
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating if the scheduler display area is restricted to only working hours in a Day View.

data.name: DayViewStyles
data.value: Provides access to the DayViewStyles object, containing style settings that control the appearance of the Day View elements.

data.name: DayViewTimeRulers
data.value: Provides access to the View's collection of time rulers.

data.name: DayViewTimeScale
data.value: Gets or sets the time interval for the time slots in the working area of a scheduler.

data.name: DayViewTimeSlots
data.value: Gets the View's collection of time slots.

data.name: DayViewTopRowTimeChanged
data.value: This event is intended for internal use.

data.name: DayViewVisibleRowCountChanged
data.value: This event is intended for internal use.

data.name: DayViewVisibleTime
data.value: Gets or sets the time interval visible in the working area of the Day View.

data.name: DayViewWorkTime
data.value: Gets or sets the work time interval for a Day View.

data.name: FullWeekViewStyles
data.value: Provides access to style settings that control the appearance of the Full Week View visual elements.

data.name: GotoDateFormTemplateContainerActiveViewType
data.value: Gets the type of the View which is currently used by the ASPxScheduler to show its data.

data.name: GotoDateFormTemplateContainerApplyHandler
data.value: Gets the handler for the function that performs the date navigation.

data.name: GotoDateFormTemplateContainerApplyScript
data.value: Gets the body of the function that performs a date navigation.

data.name: GotoDateFormTemplateContainerCancelHandler
data.value: Gets the handler of the cancel function.

data.name: GotoDateFormTemplateContainerCancelScript
data.value: Gets the body of the cancel function.

data.name: GotoDateFormTemplateContainerDate
data.value: Gets a date to be set in the form's date editor.

data.name: GotoDateFormTemplateContainerViewsDataSource
data.value: Gets a list of enabled ASPxScheduler Views.

data.name: MonthlyRecurrenceControlDayNumber
data.value: Gets or sets the month's day number in which the appointment is scheduled.

data.name: MonthlyRecurrenceControlPeriodicity
data.value: Gets or sets the number of months between occurrences.

data.name: MonthlyRecurrenceControlStart
data.value: Gets or sets the date when the recurrence chain begins.

data.name: MonthlyRecurrenceControlWeekDays
data.value: Gets or sets the weekday settings.

data.name: MonthlyRecurrenceControlWeekOfMonth
data.value: Gets or sets the number of the week in a month when an appointment is scheduled.

data.name: MonthViewCompressWeekend
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating if the weekend days (Saturday and Sunday) should be displayed in one column.

data.name: MonthViewShowWeekend
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating if the scheduler should also show its data for the weekend days (Saturday and Sunday) in a Month View.

data.name: MonthViewStyles
data.value: Provides access to style settings that control the appearance of the Month View visual elements.

data.name: MonthViewWeekCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of weeks that are simultaneously displayed within the Week View.

data.name: ResourceNavigatorVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets the visibility behavior of the Resource Navigator.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsActiveViewChanged
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's ASPxClientScheduler.ActiveViewChanged event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsActiveViewChanging
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's SchedulerClientSideEvents.ActiveViewChanging event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsAppointmentClick
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's ASPxClientScheduler.AppointmentClick event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsAppointmentDeleting
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's ASPxClientScheduler.AppointmentDeleting event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsAppointmentDoubleClick
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's ASPxClientScheduler.AppointmentDoubleClick event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsAppointmentDrop
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's AppointmentDrop event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsAppointmentResize
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's AppointmentResize event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsAppointmentsSelectionChanged
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's ASPxClientScheduler.AppointmentsSelectionChanged event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsMenuItemClicked
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's ASPxClientScheduler.MenuItemClicked event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsMoreButtonClicked
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's ASPxClientScheduler.MoreButtonClicked event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsSelectionChanged
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's ASPxClientScheduler.SelectionChanged event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsSelectionChanging
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's ASPxClientScheduler.SelectionChanging event.

data.name: SchedulerClientSideEventsVisibleIntervalChanged
data.value: Gets or sets a client-side handler for a client scheduler's ASPxClientScheduler.VisibleIntervalChanged event.

data.name: SchedulerFormTemplateContainerCancelHandler
data.value: Gets the function handler for the Cancel function.

data.name: SchedulerFormTemplateContainerCancelScript
data.value: Gets the body of the Cancel function.

data.name: SchedulerFormTemplateContainerCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the caption of the form.

data.name: SchedulerFormTemplateContainerControl
data.value: Gets the Scheduler control associated with the form.

data.name: SchedulerFormTemplateContainerControlClientId
data.value: Gets the Client ID of the form.

data.name: SchedulerFormTemplateContainerControlId
data.value: Gets the programmatic identifier assigned to the form control (server-side).

data.name: SchedulerFormTemplateContainerIsFormRecreated
data.value: Gets whether the form has been already built so it does not require to create a child control hierarchy.

data.name: SchedulerFormTemplateContainerTimeZoneHelper
data.value: Provides access to the object used for time zone conversion within the form.

data.name: SchedulerViewBaseDisplayName
data.value: Gets or sets the string to display to indicate the currently active view.

data.name: SchedulerViewBaseEnabled
data.value: Gets or sets whether a particular View is enabled for the scheduler.

data.name: SchedulerViewBaseMenuCaption
data.value: Gets or sets the menu caption string to indicate the View.

data.name: SchedulerViewBaseMoreButtonHTML
data.value: Specifies the HTML string used as the caption in the \"Show more\" buttons.

data.name: SchedulerViewBaseNavigationButtonAppointmentSearchInterval
data.value: Specifies the time span used to search for appointments by Navigation Buttons.

data.name: SchedulerViewBaseNavigationButtonVisibility
data.value: Gets or sets the condition for display of the Navigation Buttons.

data.name: SchedulerViewBaseResourcesPerPage
data.value: Gets or sets the number of resources shown at one time on a screen.

data.name: SchedulerViewBaseShortDisplayName
data.value: Gets or sets a short name of the current view.

data.name: SchedulerViewBaseShowMoreButtons
data.value: Gets or sets a value which specifies if the More Buttons should be shown in the current View.

data.name: SchedulerViewRepositoryDayView
data.value: Gets an object that defines the settings of the scheduler's Day View.

data.name: SchedulerViewRepositoryMonthView
data.value: Gets an object that defines the settings of the scheduler's Month View.

data.name: SchedulerViewRepositoryTimelineView
data.value: Gets an object that defines the settings of the scheduler's Timeline View.

data.name: SchedulerViewRepositoryWeekView
data.value: Gets an object that defines the settings of the scheduler's Week View.

data.name: SchedulerViewRepositoryWorkWeekView
data.value: Gets an object that defines the settings of the scheduler's Work-Week View.

data.name: TimelineViewAppointmentDisplayOptions
data.value: Provides access to the Timeline View appointments display options.

data.name: TimelineViewCellAutoHeightOptions
data.value: Provides access to options for specifying cell auto height behavior.

data.name: TimelineViewIntervalCount
data.value: Gets or sets the number of time intervals displayed in the Timeline View.

data.name: TimelineViewOptionsSelectionBehavior
data.value: Provides access to properties which specify how the time cell selection changes when the Timeline scale is changed.

data.name: TimelineViewScales
data.value: Provides access to a collection of time scales displayed in the timeline view.

data.name: TimelineViewStyles
data.value: Provides access to style settings that control the appearance of the Timeline View visual elements.

data.name: TimelineViewWorkTime
data.value: Gets or sets the work time interval for a Timeline View.

data.name: WeeklyRecurrenceControlPeriodicity
data.value: Gets or sets the number of weeks between weeks containing scheduled appointments.

data.name: WeeklyRecurrenceControlWeekDays
data.value: Gets or sets the weekdays containing scheduled appointments.

data.name: WeekViewAppointmentDisplayOptions
data.value: Provides access to the Week View appointments display options.

data.name: WeekViewCellAutoHeightOptions
data.value: Provides access to options for specifying cell auto height behavior.

data.name: WeekViewStyles
data.value: Provides access to style settings that control the appearance of the Week View visual elements.

data.name: WorkWeekViewShowFullWeek
data.value: Gets or sets a value indicating whether this view should show all the days of the week.

data.name: WorkWeekViewStyles
data.value: Provides access to the WorkWeekViewStyles object, containing styles used for displaying visual elements of the WorkWeekView.

data.name: YearlyRecurrenceControlDayNumber
data.value: Gets or sets the month's day number in which the appointment is scheduled.

data.name: YearlyRecurrenceControlMonth
data.value: Gets or sets the month's number.

data.name: YearlyRecurrenceControlStart
data.value: Gets or sets the date when the recurrence chain begins.

data.name: YearlyRecurrenceControlWeekDays
data.value: Gets or sets the weekday settings of the yearly recurrence.

data.name: YearlyRecurrenceControlWeekOfMonth
data.value: Gets or sets the week number in a month when an appointment is scheduled.
